PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-09492018-06-26,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCannabis Act
SubjectIndustrial Hemp Regulations
PrecisINDUSTRIAL HEMP REGULATIONS in order to support the government’s public health and public safety goals of restricting youth access to cannabis, minimizing the harms of cannabis use, and preventing criminals and organized crime from profiting from the production of cannabis.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0145 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Industrial Hemp Regulations
